member.name: T:CSF.Reflection.IStaticallyReflects
member.summary: A service which performs static reflection. It gets MemberInfo instances based upon an expression lambda indicating a property, field, method or other member.

member.name: M:CSF.Reflection.IStaticallyReflects.Member``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}})
member.summary: Gets a from an expression that indicates a member of a specified type.
member.param: The lambda expression that indicates a type, such as x => x.MyProperty.
member.typeparam: The type that contains the member which we are interested in.
member.exception: Is thrown when an argument passed to a method is invalid because it is .
Is thrown when an argument passed to a method is invalid.

member.name: M:CSF.Reflection.Reflector.Member(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Gets a from the given linq expression.

remarks.para: This private method wraps the differing mechanisms by which static reflection can be performed:

list.item: Determine whether or not the expression is a unary (value type) expression or not. If it is then use the operand for further analysis.
Determine whether the expression-to-analyse is a member expression or a method call expression.
Cast the expression appropriately and retirve the member.

member.param: The expression to parse for a member.
member.exception: Raised if the is null.
Raised if the does not reflect a single member.
